content:
| Command | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `/show <Job ID #>` | Revives a Job using the specified Job ID. |
| `/show <Job ID #> to <channel/server>` | Moves a Job to the specified channel or server using the specified Job ID. |
| `/show <Job ID #> refresh` | Refreshes an old Job with new variations, upscaling, or newer parameters and features using the specified Job ID. |

Note: `/show` only works for your own jobs.

To find a Job ID:

| Method | Description |
| --- | --- |
| On the Web | Select ... > Copy... > Job ID in the member gallery. |
| From the URL | The last part of the URL when viewing an image in the member gallery. |
| From the File Name | The last part of the file name when viewing an image downloaded from the member gallery. |

Animated Gif Showing how to use the Midjourney Show command is also provided.
